title: LOL: 'The View' Hilariously Defends Don Lemon, Says He Isn't A Misogynist Because He Loves His Mom
description:
The ladies of The View came to the defense of Don Lemon amidst his abrupt termination from CNN. Though it's rumored the firing had something to do with the spar between him and Vivek Ramaswamy, the ladies defended him against accusations of misogyny. Y'know, due to that whole "past her prime" thing.

Sunny Hostin admitted she is biased, since she's been friends with Don for 20 years. But she doesn't believe he's a misogynist. Because he loves his mom. And her.

"I don't believe in my experience with him that he's a misogynist. He loves his mother. He loved his sister. He loves me. He loves Joy."

Sunny admitted he has said things that were "ageist and sexist," but he apologized and underwent formal training. Joy jumped in to explain how Don is nothing at all like Tucker Carlson: "He's been on the air a long time fighting bigotry, whereas Tucker has been fomenting bigotry." She also referred to Lemon's more questionable comments as "dumb things."

\u201cJoy Behar comes to Lemon's aid: "He's been on the air a long time fighting bigotry, whereas Tucker has been fomenting bigotry."\nShe calls his agist, sexist, and racist comments simply "dumb things."\u201d
— Nicholas Fondacaro (@Nicholas Fondacaro) 1682437061

Sara Haines blamed Lemon's firing on the new management. Under Chris Licht's leadership, the network has publicly announced its desire to become less partisan. Whoopi then chimed in with a real zinger, asking why, if CNN thought Don was a misogynist, did they put him on a morning show with two women?

"If you're concerned that somebody is a misogynist, why would you put them with two women to do a show? If you feel that way, if you feel that concern- so for me, it seemed odd when they gave him that show, and I thought, this seems a little strange."

\u201cWhoopi Goldberg bashes CNN: "If you're concerned that somebody is a misogynist, why would you put them with two women...?"\nTouts her friendship with him.\u201d
— Nicholas Fondacaro (@Nicholas Fondacaro) 1682437061

Now, if Tucker Carlson had said women are "past their prime" after age 50, do you think the ladies would have the same reaction?Even if he underwent "formal training"?

That being said, I personally don't think Don Lemon is a misogynist. I guess I'm just not surprised a gay man isn't too fond of women.

>

<

Lily is a Zoomer college dropout who somehow landed a writing gig here at LwC.com. In her spare time, she enjoys going for runs, touching grass, and occasionally tweeting tweets for fellow tweeters.

title: Study Justifying Child Sex Changes Included Teen Who Died After Doctors Used Colon Tissue For 'Neovagina'
description:
It's almost like mutilating the genitals of human beings is objectively bad. No matter the "reason".

A 2016 medical article documented the death of an 18-year-old male participant in a Dutch study on gender transition surgeries. According to The Post Millennial, the article indicates that the teen died due to puberty suppression. In reality, the teen died due to the experimental surgery he underwent. The complications that arose were due to the surgical method rendered necessary by his early pubertal suppression. So, in a roundabout way, this isn't technically a lie. But in a much more straightforward way, it's a lie.

\u201cTrans teen died from vaginoplasty complications during landmark Dutch study used to justify child sex changes\n\nhttps://t.co/uixST6S2rA\u201d
— The Post Millennial (@The Post Millennial) 1682432568

You see, the teen patient did not have enough penile tissue to construct a fake vagina, so the researchers took some from his colon. (The same thing happened to Jazz Jennings, by the way, and Jazz suffered from severe complications.) This resulted in major complications just 24 hours following surgery, and eventually a diagnosis of fatal necrotizing fasciitis. The patient went into multiple organ failure and died.

The investigation into the death revealed that the deadly strain of E-coli likely came from the patient's own intestines. But despite all of this horror, the study still proclaims the greatness of these "gender-affirming surgeries":

"Transgender women with early-onset gender dysphoria, treated with puberty suppressing hormones, report fewer behavioral and emotional problems and an improvement of general functioning."

It also assures the reader that "vaginal reconstruction" has a "positive influence" on the quality of life of “non-transgender and transgender women." To its credit, it cautions doctors and patients against complications that may arise. Like death.

I am honestly at a loss for words. This story is so appalling, it seems like it came right out of a horror movie. But no, it's what the left claims is the "compassionate" approach to treating gender dysphoria. It has got to stop.

>

<

Lily is a Zoomer college dropout who somehow landed a writing gig here at LwC.com. In her spare time, she enjoys going for runs, touching grass, and occasionally tweeting tweets for fellow tweeters.

title: Exposing the scheme behind Tucker Carlson's ouster from Fox News: "They coming after ALL of us"
description:
Today, Crowder discussed the story currently dominating the news cycle - Tucker Carlson's ouster from Fox. Crowder set the stage by explaining the shock that surrounded yesterday's announcement and highlighting the lack of details given.

Crowder then played a clip of him and the crew reacting to the news live on yesterday's show, and the announcement that read: "FOX News Media and Tucker Carlson have agreed to part ways [...] Mr. Carlson's last program was Friday April 21st. Fox News Tonight will air live at 8PM/ET starting this evening as an interim show helmed by rotating FOX News personalities until a new host is named."

Crowder then got into some of the new information: Carlson was reportedly pushed out by Rupert Murdoch, and it is apparently related to a discrimination lawsuit by Murdoch's former booking producer. Murdoch was also reportedly uncomfortable with Carlson's January 6th reporting, specifically the "cOnSpIrAcY tHeOrY" it was instigated by the feds. Crowder then pointed out how, whether you like Tucker or not, January 6th coverage is something all conservatives should be supporting. And it takes a loooot of courage for someone like Tucker Carlson to cover the story despite the intense opposition.

Crowder also criticized the point of contention regarding government involvement in January 6th. He pointed out the ridiculous amount of FBI agents involved in the "plot" to kidnap Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer and that federal agents were admittedly at the Capitol, undercover, in the crowds and trespassing. Crowder then explained how this is the crux of the problem with news media - it doesn't allow people like Tucker Carlson to step outside of pre-approved boundaries of censorship.

Crowder dug even deeper into the plot to oust Tucker, as well as Don Lemon's less-monumental firing from CNN. Be sure to tune into the whole show on Rumble.

>

<

title: Video exposes how bad a Target has to lock down merchandise in San Francisco so it isn't stolen
description:
Nothing more clearly displays the decline of an empire quite like rampant, low-level crime. Like this Target in San Francisco that has to lock up...everything. Literally, everything. Not a single good can be left unguarded.

\u201cThis is what Target in San Francisco looks like\u201d
— Clown World \u2122 \ud83e\udd21 (@Clown World \u2122 \ud83e\udd21) 1682106692
\u201cSan Francisco Target puts entire inventory on lockdown amid shoplifting crisis https://t.co/bEON61Nww1\u201d
— New York Post (@New York Post) 1682422264

It's not uncommon for stores like Target to keep pricier items locked up. But this is next-level. Even inexpensive items like toiletries and cosmetics are given maximum security at this San Fran location. According to a local news station, this Target has been locking everything down since at least October of last year, due to out-of-control shoplifting that began amidst the pandemic. This spike in organized crime caused five Walgreens in the San Francisco area to close, as well as a Whole Foods just a few weeks ago.

A 2022 retail security survey ranked the San Francisco and Oakland area as the second-most hard-hit by theft in 2020 and 2021. Los Angeles clinched the number one spot, while New York City was close behind. According to the organization, body wash and over-the-counter medication are hot commodities to shoplifters because they can often sell these items on the black market to smaller stores.

Part of the problem in SF is the dramatic understaffing of the police force - 25% - after they failed to replace over 500 officers who retired or resigned. The Mayor recently explained, “People want our officers to focus on the open-air drug dealing, retail theft, home burglaries, and violence impacting our neighborhoods, but we need more police to deliver." This understaffing could also explain the police force's 36-hour response times. (Seriously. That's a thing that's happening.)

I've said it over and over again every time we cover a story about California. But why in the world does anyone still live there? Earthquakes. Blizzards. Homelessness. Crime. Trans-ing the kids. I get it's a beautiful state, but, at what cost?

>

<

Lily is a Zoomer college dropout who somehow landed a writing gig here at LwC.com. In her spare time, she enjoys going for runs, touching grass, and occasionally tweeting tweets for fellow tweeters.

title: WATCH TODAY'S SHOW: THE GRAND PLAN BEHIND TUCKER CARLSON'S FIRING!
description:
In a strange turn of events, Tucker Carlson & Don Lemon both got fired. This was no coincidence. We break down the reasoning behind why. Also, Joe Biden announced he's running for re-election in 2024. Not only is he lying but he's also coming for your kids.

CELEBRATE THE WIN: BUD LIGHT UPDATE

  • Controversial Bud Light executive taking "leave of absence" after torpedoing brand in the name of Dylan Mulvaney
  • Bud Light Brewer Puts Two Executives on Leave After Uproar Over Transgender Influencer
  • BUD LIGHT’S NEW LEADER ALISSA HEINERSCHEID ON HOW SHE’LL APPROACH THE JOB

BIDEN REELECTION

  • Watch As Joe Biden Slams 'MAGA Extremists' In His Official 2024 Announcement Video
  • How Biden Has Made Policy With Short-Term, Costly Rules: Charts
  • Biden signs most sweeping gun reform bill in decades
  • Fact Checker: Is Reynolds correct that Biden has more executive orders than any other president?
  • Family attorney: President Biden has invited Ralph Yarl to perform the saxophone at The White House
  • Neighbor: Girl, 6, and parents shot, wounded over stray ball in Gaston County; suspect surrenders in Florida
  • Florida's "Parental Rights in Education"
  • Biden team works to finalize reelection plans as polls show tepid support for a 2024 bid
  • "There’s no such thing as someone else's child…Our nation's children are all our children"
  • Chapter II. Proletarians and Communists

DON LEMON FIRED

  • Don Lemon announces his termination on Twitter
  • Don Lemon ousted at CNN
  • Don Lemon spreads fake news about getting fired by CNN, gets called out for it... by CNN

TUCKER CARLSON

  • Tucker Carlson departs Fox News, pushed out by Rupert Murdoch
  • Fox Corporation sheds $930 million in market value after announcing Tucker Carlson is leaving the news network
  • Fox Corporation (FOX)
  • Watch: AOC Smugly Celebrates Tucker Carlson's Ouster, Says 'Deplatforming Works'
  • Dan Bongino parts ways with Fox News
  • Anti-trans activist Matt Walsh is losing thousands because he won’t stop misgendering Dylan Mulvaney
  • Tucker Carlson leaves Fox News days after Dominion lawsuit settlement
  • Rumble has been under continuous DDOS attacks over the past few weeks

GAY “THROUPLE” ADOPTING CHILD

  • I'm in a throuple and we ALL want to be recognized as parents on our child's birth certificate - it's the same as fighting for gay marriage
  • This Throuple Made History With Their First Child. Here's What Their Lives Are Like.

title: AOC smugly celebrates Tucker Carlson's ouster, brags that 'deplatforming works'
description:
Alexandria Ocasio Cortez is thrilled that Tucker Carlson is out at Fox. Though she apparently fears he will make a return. Which he probably (hopefully) will.

\u201c\u201cDeplatforming works and is important.\u201d Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez smugly celebrates Fox News killing Tucker Carlson\u2019s show.\u201d
— Catch Up (@Catch Up) 1682401843

"Tucker Carlson is out at Fox News. Couldn't have happened to a better guy. What I will say though is, while I'm very glad that the person who was arguably responsible for some of the largest, driving some of the most amounts of death threats and violent threats, not just to my office, but to plenty of people across the country."

"I also kind of feel like I'm waiting for the cut scene at the end of a Marvel movie after all the credits have rolled and then you see like the villian's, like, hand reemerge out to grip over, like, the building or something..."

"But, deplatforming works, and it is important, and um...there you go. Good things can happen."

The timing of Tucker's ouster is quite odd, as just this past weekend, AOC literally called for Tucker and Fox News to be shut down. Because they're too mean, or something. She accused both of "inciting violence" in January 6th and said it would be "better for the country" if Fox News's Dominion case had not concluded with a settlement.

"I believe that when it comes to broadcast television, like Fox News, these are subject to federal law, federal regulation in terms of what’s allowed on air and what isn’t."

“When you look at what Tucker Carlson and some of these other folks on Fox do, it is very, very clearly incitement of violence — very clearly incitement of violence. And that is the line that we have to be willing to contend with.”

I don't *think* AOC has enough power to actually be responsible for Tucker's departure. But it is a weird coincidence.

>

<

Lily is a Zoomer college dropout who somehow landed a writing gig here at LwC.com. In her spare time, she enjoys going for runs, touching grass, and occasionally tweeting tweets for fellow tweeters.

title: Watch As Joe Biden Slams 'MAGA Extremists' In His Official 2024 Announcement Video
description:
Ladies and gentleman, it's official. Joe Biden is officially running for reelection in 2024. Hooray!

Biden made the announcement in an early morning tweet. What else did you expect from our basement-dwelling President?

\u201cEvery generation has a moment where they have had to stand up for democracy. To stand up for their fundamental freedoms. I believe this is ours.\n\nThat\u2019s why I\u2019m running for reelection as President of the United States. Join us. Let\u2019s finish the job. https://t.co/V9Mzpw8Sqy\u201d
— Joe Biden (@Joe Biden) 1682416800

"Every generation has a moment where they have had to stand up for democracy. To stand up for their fundamental freedoms. I believe this is ours. That’s why I’m running for reelection as President of the United States. Join us. Let’s finish the job."

Ah yes, nothing says "democracy," like the attempted imprisonment of your political opposition. And nothing says "fundamental freedoms" like the forced injection of a novel, experimental technology.

"Freedom," Biden says in the video, after a montage of videos from January 6th, and a woman holding a sign that says "Abortion is healthcare."

"Personal freedom is fundamental to who we are as Americans. There's nothing more important. Nothing more sacred. That's been the work of my first term. To fight for our democracy. This shouldn't be a red or blue issue."

"To protect our rights. To make sure that everyone in this country is treated equally, and everyone is given a fair shot at making it."

It then cuts back to January 6th. The darkest day in the history of our "democracy".

"But you know, around the country, MAGA extremists are lining up to take on those bedrock freedoms. Cutting Social Security, that you've paid for your entire life, while cutting taxes for the very wealthy. Dictating what healthcare decisions women can make. Banning books and telling people who they can love. All while making it more difficult for you to be able to vote."

I wouldn't consider myself an "extremist". But last I checked, Social Security is not a "fundamental freedom." Nor is being taxed out of existence. And murder isn't a healthcare decision, children's books shouldn't contain pornography, marriage is between a man and a woman, and a person should have to identify themselves in order to vote. Any further questions?

>

<

Lily is a Zoomer college dropout who somehow landed a writing gig here at LwC.com. In her spare time, she enjoys going for runs, touching grass, and occasionally tweeting tweets for fellow tweeters.

title: Watch: Rapper offers newly unemployed Don Lemon a job selling chicken for him
description:
Rick Ross is the biggest boss. He's a shareholder in Swerve Strickland's Mogul Affiliates and owns over two dozen Wing Stop franchises throughout America. Don Lemon is a fakenewsman who got sh*tcanned from CNN on Monday.

Knowing how tough it is out there in this economy, Ross reached out to Lemon with an opportunity.

Rick Ross reacts to Don Lemon getting fired from CNN 😭😭

“We hiring at Wingstop” pic.twitter.com/AB2p9wEjeR
— XXL Magazine (@XXL) April 24, 2023
Damn, Don. But guess what? The brother's got your back. We’re hiring at Wingstop, And for some reason, I feel like you know what you’re doing with them lemon pepper wings. Just send over your resume. I’m going to ensure I get you in front of the right grill.\

Lemon had such a rough Monday you would think he was a Boomtown Rats song. Any attention he may have hoped to get from getting fired was dwarfed when Tucker Carlson and Fox News agreed to part ways. Unlike Lemon, Carlson is respected by his audience and relevant in the media landscape. It would not surprise me to discover CNN president Chris Licht heard the Tucker news and say "Quick, get Don's agent on the phone while everyone is distracted."

Then when Lemon made the announcement himself, he got called out for being fake news... BY CNN!

Who knows what's next for Don Lemon? With such a stunning sizzle reel, I'm sure the other media companies will come a-running:

  • Don Lemon Gets Sour, Brags About Cutting Trump Supporters Out of His Life
  • Don Lemon: Florida law banning porn in schools is totally 'like the 1950s all over again' or something
  • CNN's Don Lemon Lectures Terry Crews: Black Lives Matter Doesn't Mean All Black Lives Matter
  • Don Lemon Begs Mother to Follow Science and ... Take Off Her Mask
  • Don Lemon Kills Parody, Tells Chris Cuomo 'Jesus Wasn't Perfect'

Godspeed, Don. On behalf of all of us here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website, we wish you well in your future endeavors.

Though if we can offer two pieces of advice? You should give Rick Ross's offer some serious considerartion. And when you're out drinking your sorrows away in The Hamptons this weekend, try to keep your hands to yourself.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Watch: Joe Rogan, Jim Breuer lose their s*** laughing at Bud Light's pathetic attempt to win back conservatives
description:
Bud Light done messed up selling out their loyal customer base in an attempt to pander to titface performer Dylan Mulvaney's audience. To win back customers, the company released an over-the-top patriotic ad that would even make the crowd at CPAC say, "I don't think you're taking my concerns seriously,"

Joe Rogan watched the panderthon with Jim Breuer. And the two comedians lost. their. sh*t.

Joe Rogan slams Bud Light’s pivot to a pro-American ad after their tranny stunt.

“Shut the f*ck up. Now, I hate you more. Like, what are you doing?”

“Was this AI-generated? That's probably a Chat GPT 4.0 version of the perfect American commercial.”

He speaks for most… pic.twitter.com/89jp6vv6JY
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg) April 22, 2023

"It hurts my feelings it's so dumb."

"This is a company in deep shit."

"Shut the f*ck up, now I hate you more."

"That's like the dumbest commercial of all time."

Talladega is not drinking @budlight today 😂 pic.twitter.com/InXq1yYRPi
— Old Row (@OldRowOfficial) April 24, 2023

Here's the thing: I actually think this commercial is WORSE than the Dylan Mulvaney video. At least with Dylan, the company had the sense to not publicize the video themselves. Dylan did his Dylan crap on TikTok, then the internet took over. Anheuser Busch is ACKSHUALLY airing this commercial on television! I saw it during The Office on Sunday. Even Michael Scott would say, "This rube bait tries too hard."

It got me thinking while writing this. Did VP Melissa Weinerchild or whatever her name is get fired/take a leave of absence over the Dylan Mulvaney mistake? Or did she take a leave of absence/get fired because THIS was her idea for the company to win back customers and billions of dollars?

The only thing missing was Lee Greenwood and a bald eagle shedding a single tear while watching TikTok videos.

>

<

Brodigan is Grand Poobah of this here website and when he isn't writing words about things enjoys day drinking, pro-wrestling, and country music. You can find him on the Twitter too.

title: Pervert Disney World employee arrested taking "upskirt" video of teen at Star Wars store, had over 500 videos
description:
I know what you're thinking. "A pervert working at Disney World? The heck you say!" Yes, a security guard at a Star Wars store got off seeing girls in their underpants without them knowing. His six-year operation came to an end when he was caught taking one "upskirt video" too many.

And "upskirt video" is exactly what it sounds like. You take videos of whatever going on up girls' skirts. If you are not only a pervert but have an above-average lack of self-esteem, it's the content for you.

Jorge Diaz Vega was arrested in March when security caught him taking a video of an unexpecting eighteen-year-old shopping for a lightsaber at "Dok-Ondar’s Den of Antiquities." I'm not sure what a Dok-Ondar is, but I fell off with the Disneyfied Star Wars crap.

Upon Vega's arrest, he admitted to having quite the operation for himself. He's been doing it for over six years and has amassed a library of over five hundred videos.

This part needs to be quoted verbatim:

Diaz Vega told deputies he had over 500 videos on his phone, which he said he recorded as a "guilty pleasure" for his own sexual gratification, since "it is hard to find them online," the affidavit states.

Mr. Diaz has been charged with "third-degree felony video voyeurism for recording female guests without their knowledge."

Disney World confirmed to the local news that this pervert is no longer employed by the company.
